attributes.action: Bring back the death penilty for child killers  !!!!!!!!
attributes.additional_details: Why are these people getting away with taking innocent little lives ? Young children taken away from there parents and never seen again alive.It is tragic and they needs to be a punishment that will see they dont ever commit murder again. WE SAY BRING BACK THE DEATH PENALTY !!!! We currently have thousands of murderers and child abduction prisoners in the UK they are treated like royalty 4 square meals a day ? A bed ? A tv and computer console ? The Americans deal with  murderers like the murderers treated there victims BRING BACK THE DEATH PENALTY  !!!!!!!!!!!
